{{Multiple issues| {{update|date=May 2011}} {{refimprove|date=May 2011}} {{Expert-subject|Firearms|date=May 2011}} }} {{infobox weapon | name = Heckler & Koch MG5 | image = [[File:Hk121.jpg|300px]] | caption = HK MG5 general-purpose machine gun | origin = [[Germany]] | type = [[General-purpose machine gun]] | is_ranged = YES | service = 2010–present | used_by = See [[Heckler & Koch MG5#Users|users]] | wars = | designer = | design_date = 2010 | manufacturer = [[Heckler & Koch]] | unit_cost = | production_date = 2010–present | number = | variants = See [[Heckler & Koch MG5#Variants|variants]] | spec_label = | weight = | length = | part_length = | cartridge = [[7.62×51mm NATO]] | cartridge_weight = | caliber = 7.62 mm | barrel = | action = [[Gas-operated reloading|Gas-operated]], [[rotating bolt]] | rate = 640/720/800 rounds/min | velocity = MG 5 A1: 840 m/s
MG 5 & MG 5 S: 810 m/s
MG 5 A2: 785 m/s | range = 600 m (bipod) | max_range = 1,200–1,500 m (gun mount) | feed = 50-round [[Belt (firearm)|belt]] in [[Drum magazine|drum]] container or 120-round belt in separate box | sights = [[Diopter sight]]{{cite journal|last=Weisswange|first=Jan-Phillipp|author2=u. a|title=Handwaffen, Kampfmittel und Ausrüstung für den infanteristischen Einsatz|journal=Wehrtechnischer Report 4/2010|date=April 2010|accessdate=November 2010|publisher=Report Verlag|location=Bonn und Sulzbach|language=German}} }} The '''MG5''' (formerly known as the '''HK121''') is a general-purpose machine gun manufactured by Heckler & Koch. The weapon is intended as a replacement for the [[Rheinmetall MG3]]. The MG5 resembles the 5.56×45mm NATO [[Heckler & Koch MG4]] light machine gun, which was adopted into German military service in 2005. In June 2013, it was announced that Germany was testing and evaluating 65 samples and planned to buy at least 7,114 of the machine guns for the Bundeswehr during 2014–2017, in a deal that over time could grow to 12,733 HK121s.
"...will der Bund von 2014 an bis zum Jahr 2017 '''mindestens''' 7114 Gewehre des Typs MG5 im Wert von 118 Millionen Euro kaufen. ... Später kann die Order laut Rahmenvertrag sogar auf '''bis zu''' 12.733 Maschinengewehre in einem Gesamtwert von rund 240 Millionen Euro anwachsen."
[http://www.wiwo.de/politik/deutschland/ruestungsauftrag-heckler-und-koch-gewehre-fuer-die-bundeswehr/8314234.html "Heckler & Koch-Gewehre für die Bundeswehr"] Wiwo.de. Retrieved 2013-07-27. ==Design details== The MG5 is gas-operated and chambered for the 7.62×51mm NATO round. The weapon's operation is almost similar to that of the MG4 light machine gun. The safety and three-position fire rate selector levers are ambidextrous, the butt stock can be folded depending on the variant, and numerous [[Picatinny rail]]s allow installation of optical sights and other accessories. The quick-change barrel has a heat shield and a carrying/barrel exchange handle. A hot barrel can be replaced without protective gloves. The iron sights consist of a collapsible front sight and a height and windage adjustable rear diopter sight. The charging handle is on the right side of the weapon. For feeding, 50-round belted ammunition pouches or 120-round belted ammunition boxes can be mounted on the left side. The MG5 can be installed on all mounts and tripods originally developed for MG3 machine guns, using additional adapters. ==Variants== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; vertical-align:center;" !Variant !Overall lengthOverall length: ''Stock unfolded'' (''Stock folded'')
''mm'' !Barrel length
''mm'' !Height
''mm'' !Width
''mm'' !WeightWeight: ''Weapon'' (''Barrel'')
''kg'' |- |'''MG5''' (Universal) |1160 (960) |550 |239 |rowspan="3"|120 |11.20 (3.00) |- |'''MG5 A2''' (Infantry) |1060Fixed stock |460 |285 |9.90 (2.50) |- |'''MG5 A1''' (Mounted) |1055 |663 |195 |10.00 (3.24) |- |'''MG5 S''' (Special Forces) |1012 |550 |239 |171 |12,10 (3,00) |- |colspan="8" style="text-align:left;"| |} ==Users== * {{flag|Germany}}: Fifteen ''[[Bundeswehr]]'' pre-production guns designated as MG5.{{cite web |url=http://www.schwarzwaelder-bote.de/inhalt.oberndorf-a-n-heckler-koch-grossauftrag-fuer-bundeswehr.0912db36-5077-47d0-8592-7d23d7a06151.html |title=Heckler & Koch: Großauftrag für Bundeswehr |author=Karin Zeger |work=Schwarzwälder Bote |date=2013-07-15 |access-date=2013-07-20 |language=German}} First batch of 1,215 MG5s ordered on 15 March 2015 for about €20 million.[http://www.thefirearmblog.com/blog/2015/06/10/hk-troubles-continue-mg5-under-scrutiny-by-german-mod/ "H&K Troubles Continue: MG5 Under Scrutiny By German MoD"]. The Firearms Blog, 2015-06-10. The procurement process of 12,733 units, with a price tag of about €200 million, has been delayed due to accuracy concerns.[http://www.thefirearmblog.com/blog/2015/09/09/delays-beset-german-mg5-program-outlets-report-7-62mm-gpmg-lacks-accuracy/ "BREAKING: Delays Beset German MG5 Program, 7.62mm GPMG May Lack Accuracy"]. The Firearms Blog, 2015-09-09. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.heckler-koch.com/en/products/military/machine-guns/mg5/mg5/overview.html Heckler & Koch official site] * [http://www.heckler-koch.com/de/militaer/unternehmen/downloads.html Operational demonstration 'HK121 Video Clip'] (MPEG, 10 mins.) at Heckler-Koch.com * [http://world.guns.ru/machine/de/heckler-amp-koch-hk-121-e.html Modern Firearms] * [http://www.strategie-technik.de/09_10/spek.pdf Meldung in Strategie & Technik 9/2010, S. 7] {{de icon}} {{HK firearms}} {{General Purpose Machine Guns}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Heckler and Koch HK121}} [[Category:7.62 mm machine guns]] [[Category:General-purpose machine guns]] [[Category:Heckler & Koch machine guns|HK121]] [[Category:Machine guns of Germany]] [[Category:Medium machine guns]] [[Category:Post–Cold War weapons of Germany]] {{Gun-stub}}
